titleInfo.title: Citizenship and crisis : Arab Detroit after 9/11.

mods.abstract: Citizenship and crisis / Wayne Baker and Andrew Shryock -- Arab American identities in question / Andrew Shryock and Ann Chih Lin -- The aftermath of the 9/11 attacks / Sally Howell and Amaney Jamal -- Belief and belonging / Sally Howell and Amaney Jamal -- Values and cultural membership / Wayne Baker and Amaney Jamal -- Local and global social capital / Wayne Baker, Amaney Jamal, and Mark Tessler -- Civil liberties / Ronald R. Stockton -- Foreign policy / Ronald R. Stockton -- The limits of citizenship / Andrew Shryock and Ann Chih Lin.
